sources.title: ESG Maturity Scoring Rubric v3.0
sources.ebse_synthesis: Defines 7-dimensional ESG maturity framework (TSP, OSP, DM, GHG, RD, EI, RMM) with 0-4 stage progression per dimension. Specifies evidence criteria for each stage and overall maturity calculation as average of 7 scores. Aligns with TCFD, ISSB, GRI, SASB frameworks.

sources.title: MSCI ESG Ratings Methodology
sources.ebse_synthesis: MSCI rates companies AAA (leader) to CCC (laggard) based on ESG risk exposure and management. Microsoft rated AAA indicates leading ESG practices. Used as external validation benchmark for our 7-dimensional scoring to ensure alignment with industry-standard assessments.

sources.title: CDP Climate Change Questionnaire & Scoring Methodology
sources.ebse_synthesis: CDP scores companies A (leadership) to D- (disclosure) on climate change transparency and action. Microsoft A- score validates strong performance on GHG, TSP, and RD dimensions. Scoring aligns with GHG Protocol and science-based targets framework used in our rubric.

sources.title: Microsoft 2023 Environmental Sustainability Report
sources.ebse_synthesis: Microsoft's FY23 sustainability report details SBTi-validated targets, 13.9M tCO2e emissions (6.3% reduction), 19.8 GW renewable PPAs, water positive commitment, and TCFD-aligned disclosures. Used as primary test case for rubric v3.0 validation with expected high TSP, GHG, and RD scores.

sources.title: Shell Sustainability Report 2023
sources.ebse_synthesis: Shell 2023 report covers net-zero 2050 target, 50% carbon intensity reduction by 2050, 55M tonnes Scope 1/2 emissions (5% reduction), 4.1 GW renewable capacity, and TCFD/GRI/SASB alignment. Provides test case for energy transition sector scoring across all 7 dimensions.

sources.title: ExxonMobil 2023 Sustainability Report
sources.ebse_synthesis: ExxonMobil report details net-zero Scope 1/2 by 2050 commitment, 116M tonnes CO2e emissions, 50% flaring reduction, carbon capture leadership (9M tonnes), and TCFD/SASB disclosure. Test case for traditional oil/gas sector maturity assessment with focus on GHG and RMM dimensions.

sources.title: Scientific Coding Agent Protocol v13.8
sources.ebse_synthesis: SCA v13.8 mandates zero fabrication, authentic algorithms (no trivial substitutes), failure-path testing, placeholder intolerance, and traceability gates. Enforces workspace isolation, differential testing (>=1200 cases), and honest status reporting. Guides implementation quality standards for rubric v3.0.
